__gf_k1: coefficient for price in goal function
__gf_target_co2: target value for CO2 (sum within ending time)
__mins: minimax variables values [soil removal, depth, groundwater rise, level, plantings (1-grass, 2 - trees), density, grass - inputs_mult, inputs_exponent,  trees - inputs_mult, inputs_exponent; area of application (further normalized to make sum of areas<1)
__bitmask: bitmask of variables to fit (if not fitted, the value from mins is used)
__alt_areas: index of integer variable for which we assume that all alternatives are used on some per cent of total area
__one_p: >0 calculate only one potential solution, i - stop on i-th alternative
__one_p_vals: values of solution vector to calculate
